text: Hi all, is it possible to make a membership site with user registration in HubSpot ? I want to have users with dashboards, the user can leave a review etc.. is it possible to do this? i cant find any tutorial about this subject

Hi to all,
I'm new to CMS Hub, 4 years into HubSpot Mktg LPs workflows some API etc.

I have a special request.  They want a newsletter signup in the footer with juste one email field "smart" that when submitted would fire a popup form with the email field plus name perhaps company etc.
Would this be possible with both forms being HubSpot forms and without having to embark some sort of custom "lightbox" function ?

Appreciate it if anyone has any ideas :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi, is it possible to use different templates for index and dynamic page? for an example i want to use one template for /cars and another one for /cars/toyota. is this possible? i cant find any reference.
